product_name: Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Tube Cube
long_description: Tired of digging for socks in your luggage? The ultralight Eagle Creek Pack-It(TM) Specter Tube Cube keeps stuff organized in that awkward space between the handle tubes inside your wheeled bag. Made of translucent ripstop nylon so you can quickly see what's inside. The ripstop nylon is impregnated with silicone to make the cube water- and stain-resistant. Weighs only .5 oz. Grab handle lets you easily slide the Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Tube Cube in and out of your luggage.
short_description: Tired of digging for socks in your luggage? The ultralight Eagle Creek Pack-It(TM) Specter Tube Cube keeps stuff organized in that awkward space between the handle tubes inside your wheeled bag.
